body.name: 6/8/10/12 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress for Cool Sleep & Pressure Relief, Medium Firm Mattresses CertiPUR-US Certified/Bed-in-a-Box/Pressure Relieving (8 in, Full)
features: ※〖Comfortable And Breathable〗This gel memory foam mattress is slightly thicker and firmer than a traditional mattress. Gel memory foam mattress supports all parts of the body evenly and individually.

※〖Gel Process〗The gel on your mattress absorbs excess heat while you sleep, allowing you to fall asleep more quickly.Compared to conventional mattresses, the gel coating increases the mattress's use time and makes it less prone to damage.

※〖Excellent Quality〗The mattress is a total of 8 inches thick and the memory sponge is 2 inches thick.It can return to the original shape when you leave the mattress, as long as regular cleaning, the mattress will be as clean as new.

※〖Strict Packing〗The mattress is compressed into a sturdy plastic bag and protected by a cardboard box.When you need to use it, just open the plastic bag and unwrap the mattress.The mattress will return to its original shape within 6 hours.Note that it takes about 72 hours for the mattress to get rid of its odor.

※〖Easy To Clean〗It includes a soft hypoallergenic cover that is washable for your convenience. Pressure relieving gel foam naturally draws heat away from the body for a more comfortable night's sleep;Beautifully detailed all around cover with four-way stretch works with the memory foam to optimize its conforming properties.Gel-infused memory foam keeps you cool during sleep and body-contouring memory foam reduces pressure points and properly aligns the spine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Best Gel Memory Foam: A-Gel Memory foam automatically adjusts to your body’s weight and temperature. B- Our Gel Memory foam are suitable for all frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform or adjustable bed, hospital bed. C- Memory foam mattress is compressed and packaged in a box for shipping, allowing it to easily be delivered to your door and expand to its full lofty shape inside your home . D-Memory foam conducive to continuous airflow & breathable; skin-friendly fabrics adapt to the environment to keep the mattress surface at the ideal sleeping temperature. Benefits of Gel Memory Foam: Size:Full | Style:8-Inch Cool Gel Mattress Ship In One Mail Box Queen Size – 53" W x73.5" L x 8" H Get it Right the First Time It is also a good idea to know the size and the height of your mattress ahead of time to make sure you are ordering the correct size. Keep in mind that you should combine the height of your bed frame, foundation, or adjustable bed base with the height of your mattress to get a gauge of the how tall your sleep system will be. CARE INSTRUCTIONS UPON RECEIPT: NOTE: Please allow up to 72 hours after opening the mattress for any potential odor to dissipate and adjust to its final feel once the foam settles . It is also a good idea to know the size and the height of your mattress ahead of time to make sure you are ordering the correct size. Keep in mind that you should combine the height of your bed frame, foundation, or adjustable bed base with the height of your mattress to get a gauge of the how tall your sleep system will be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased this for a guest room but since we have kids in school and someone is sick all the time we used this a lot. It's very comfortable and an excellent choice for the price. So far all 4 of us have used it several times and it was comfortable for everyone, no complaints and everyone got a good nights sleep. In my household we are ages 2-45. When I unpacked it I gave it a full 48 hours to decompress fully before anyone used it. The smell was ok when I unpacked it, I've experienced worse in the past with other mattresses, it went away after about a day and a half.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best budget mattress
reviews.reviewText: Best budget mattress, but shipping took a longer than expected. Order on the 7th of Jan. Prime shipping between 12th -17th. Didn't receive till the 19th. Never waited this long for anything purchased on prime. Especially living in North California where's there's Amazon hubs near by. Other than that. Mattress itself, is everything as advertised. Quality is beyond what we expected. Got the 12" king size med-firm. Feels firm but soft. Really comfortable! Right out of the box, no smell. Expanded to 12" less than a couple of hours. Which was awesome! First night of sleep on the mattress, have to say probably best nights of sleep in a long time and slept through the night without tossing and turning. Didn't wake up with back pain at all. I've been dealing with pain for a long time and this mattress really helped with lower back pressure. My wife's has worse back pain then I do and her lower back pain was relieved as well. Pain not totally gone but after a few nights her pain is getting better and better. Definitely don't hesitate to purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamy Comfort: FWD King Mattress Hits the Mark!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the FWD King Mattress with 10-inch Gel Memory Foam from Amazon, and it has exceeded my expectations in every way.The gel memory foam provides an incredible level of comfort, contouring to my body for a restful and rejuvenating night's sleep. I appreciate the balanced support it offers – not too firm, not too soft, just perfect. The 10-inch thickness adds a luxurious feel to the mattress, creating a plush sleeping surface.The mattress arrived promptly and conveniently compressed in a box. Unboxing and setting it up were a breeze, with the mattress expanding to its full size within a short time. The quality craftsmanship is evident, and the cover is not only soft but also easy to clean.What sets this mattress apart is its ability to regulate temperature with the gel-infused memory foam, keeping me cool and comfortable throughout the night.If you're in the market for a king-size mattress that combines superior comfort, support, and cooling technology, the FWD King Mattress with 10-inch Gel Memory Foam is a fantastic choice. It's a true investment in quality sleep, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their sleep experience. Ollie approves!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: When it first arrived it was about 2.5 inches high and was slanted to one side.After 6 hours the mattress started to take shape and is now up to 7 inches.I am not sure this will expand to 8 inches and I will update this after giving it two more days.One downside is that the corners do not expand totally as in the picture.Other than that it seems like a very good mattress. It’s firm and I weigh 160lbs.I do not sink at all and is supportive.I got an 8 inch for a good price but if I were to purchase it again, I am curious about the 12 inch since its only $20 difference from the 8 inch and I believe it would provide very much support.The 8 inch is totally fine though too.Additionally there is a weird smell that is still lasting after 8 hours but as the other reviews say I am waiting for it to go away in a couple more days.Very satisfied with this purchase.Update.It has been 30 hours since I've opened the mattress.Most of the parts have expanded up to around 7 and 1/2 inches, which seems enough. However, the sides are only 6 inches. The sides doesn't seem to expand that well. Overall, the mattress is very good and satisfactory. The firmness is strong but due to the 2 inch foam topper inside, it is soft. I have a 3 inch topper and when I put this on top it is extremely comfortable to lay down.I am waiting one more day for it to fully expand and then I will start sleeping on it and update it again.Regarding the smell, there is a weird smell to it still. The instructions say that the smell will go away in 72 hours, so I am giving it two more days to see what happens. I will update again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing definitely worth the purchase
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 8” twin size and it’s amazing fits perfectly! I will surely purchase again in the future when it’s time to size up from a twin to a Queen size mattress, for now I’m in love it’s soft comfortable squishy but firm, I can already tell tonight is going to be a great night of sleep! The mattress arrived a day earlier and true to size and measurements! Very satisfied customer thank you! I’ll update later on how my sleep goes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value and comfort
reviews.reviewText: This purchase has changed the way I'll buy mattresses forever. It arrives compressed in its box. Simply open the end and slide it out. Then carefully remove The plastic fill in the bag. It immediately starts reverting to its full size. I was very pleased to discover it had none of the unusual odors often associated with new memory foam. I'm ordering another one to replace another child's mattress today. It's so comfortable, and is an excellent value. When My wife and I replace ours in another year or two, this is the avenue we will be taking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: Received the mattress quicker than I thought which was great. I let it puff up for about 24 hours and it looked amazing. I got the full size 14 inch and I didn’t pull out a ruler to check, but it’s huge. Pretty firm but still cushion-y. Super comfortable bed, I love it so far! It had zero smell when I opened it up which was also a plus!
